text: Norderney is one of the East Frisian Islands off the North Sea coast of Germany. It belongs to the municipality of the district of Aurich in Lower Saxony. ==Geography== The island has a total area of and making it the ninth- largest island in Germany. It has about 6,000 people. On the northern side of the island is a long sandy beach. The neighbouring island to the east is Baltrum, which is about 800m away. To the west is the island of Juist, about away. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * Further information * * Category:Aurich (district) Category:Towns and villages in East Frisia Category:Islands of Lower Saxony
title: Norderney
